channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Export any WordPress data to XML/CSV
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Export any WordPress data to XML/CSV

item.title: CVE-2022-1800|2024-08-03T00:17:00.638Z -- unknown -- export%20any%20wordpress%20data%20to%20xml%2Fcsv
item.description: The Export any WordPress data to XML/CSV WordPress plugin before 1.3.5 does not sanitize the cpt POST parameter when exporting post data before using it in a database query, leading to an SQL injection vulnerability.
